caption: Row
description: The row object represents a row within a structured relational database or datastore table, which contains data that is able to be create, updated, deleted and queried.
name: row

created_time.description: The time when the row was known to have been created.

last_updated.description: The time when the row was known to have been created.

name.description: The row name, ordinarily as assigned by a database administrator.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the row.
